sentences.english: Kwashiorkor survivors did not overeat in this way.
sentences.chinese: 得过夸希奥科病的人就不会这样暴饮暴食。

sentences.english: Over-eating is absolutely do not reduce fat, also is not conducive to health.
sentences.chinese: 暴饮暴食是绝对减不了肥的，也是不利于健康的。

sentences.english: Many people, especially women, deal with stress by overeating.
sentences.chinese: 许多人，尤其是女性，以暴饮暴食来排解压力。

sentences.english: On occasion, she has used laxatives after binging to avoid gaining weight.
sentences.chinese: 有时，她会在暴饮暴食后使用泻剂，以避免体重增加。

sentences.english: They can overeat and gainweight if they want to.
sentences.chinese: 如果愿意，他们可以暴饮暴食，增加体重。

sentences.english: Researchers said that it is unlikely that binge eating would lead to the gene variants.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员说暴饮暴食不太可能会导致基因变异。

sentences.english: It's no good for your health to surfeit yourself.
sentences.chinese: 暴饮暴食有妨你的健康。

sentences.english: Several variants in the ghrelin gene have been linked with binge-eating disorder.
sentences.chinese: 饥饿激素的几种变异基因和暴饮暴食有着一定的联系。

sentences.english: Gluttony and drunkenness have been called carnal vices.
sentences.chinese: 暴饮暴食曾被称为肉体的堕落。

sentences.english: It might also prevent food binges at lunch or dinner.
sentences.chinese: 而且还可以防止自己不在中饭和晚饭暴饮暴食。

sentences.english: Fortunately, there's no shame in over-eating on "Turkey Day".
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，在火鸡日那天暴饮暴食没什么丢人的。

sentences.english: Such as overspend, overeat, smoke cigarettes, or any other bad habit.
sentences.chinese: 如过度消费，暴饮暴食，抽烟或者其它任何的坏习惯。

sentences.english: When they are idle they indulgethemselves into comfort lechery crapulence and gluttony .
sentences.chinese: 他们闲散时就沉溺于安乐纵欲暴饮暴食。

sentences.english: Why do people overeat, or smoke or drink in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 当初人们为什么会暴饮暴食，染上烟瘾酒瘾？

sentences.english: So what can be done to keep the gluttony under something resembling control?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能控制住即将到来的暴饮暴食呢？

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
to eat and drink as much as one likes/to make a pig of oneself
to eat and drink gluttonously/to pig out
to gobble up/to gorge oneself on (food)
